title.rendered: HOT NEW YSL BAG, SUMMER SLIDES AND ACCESSORIES

content.rendered:
HOT NEW YSL BAG, SUMMER SLIDES AND ACCESSORIES

Celebrate Summer with new bags, comfortable yet cool slides and accessories. How beautiful is this black and pale pink combination? Adding a pop of pastel pink to an all black look gives just the perfect cool girl vibes.

Black bag is YSL. Top pink slides are Balenciaga. Top black slides are from Heron Preston. Both bottom slides are from Prada. Sunglasses are from Prada.com. Pink bag is from Givenchy. And a beautiful Saint Laurent brooch.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Love Dionne,
